author: ehillenius
msg: added null check for locale and style, and exposed getResource as public because this has several valid use cases.

author: ehillenius
msg: added a reset method to be able to both free up the resource and be able to force reload of that resource. Furthermore, dispose calls reset in order to not only loose the mapping, but also free up the resource.

author: jonl
msg: Changed contructor to accept ImageResource instead of DynamicImageResource.  This will allow Eelco to load static images in for tree.
